author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
2.2.0 2021-10-20 - First succesfuly working version with HE!
2.2.1 - added 'Reverse button order' preference option
2.2.2 - added battery reporting capability; added button push() doubleTapped() and held() handlers for use in Hubutat Dashboards
2.2.4 - added support for 'YSR-MINI-Z Remote TS004F'
